attributes.action: Create Legislation to allow partial funding of the NHS from the National Lottery proceeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Lottery currently raises an inordinate amount of money. The NHS has been and still is grossly underfunded. By funding the NHS from the Lottery proceeds the service could be greatly improved through the employment of more nursing staff and building of more hospitals. This will benefit the whole Nation and could potentially allow a lowering of the tax burden on the public.
